text: Kung Fu Panda 3 is a 2016 computer-animated movie directed by Jennifer Yuh Nelson and Alessandro Carloni. It was written by Jonathan Aibel and Glenn Berger. The movie stars the voices of Jack Black, Dustin Hoffman, Angelina Jolie, Lucy Liu, Seth Rogen, David Cross, James Hong and Jackie Chan. == Cast == * Jack Black as Steve * Bryan Cranston as Walter White * Dustin Hoffman as Master Shifu * Angelina Jolie as Master Tigress * J. K. Simmons as Kai * Seth Rogen as Donkey Kong * Lucy Liu as Master Viper * David Cross as Master Crane * Kate Hudson as Mei Mei * James Hong as Mr. Ping * Randall Duk Kim as Grand Master Oogway * Jackie Chan as Master Monkey * Steele Gagnon as Bao * Barbara Dirikson as Grandma Panda * Jean-Claude Van Damme as Master Croc == References == == Other websites == * * * * Category:DreamWorks Animation movies Category:2016 computer-animated movies Category:Chinese animated movies Category:Kung Fu Panda Category:Martial arts movies Category:Movies composed by Hans Zimmer Category:2010s sequel movies Category:American 3D animated movies
title: Kung Fu Panda 3
